title: Person of Interest: Reese VS Serbian Intelligence
author: POI Fights
comment: I just love the tone in his voice when he says: "they're next door". You can practically hear the words "because of course they are" just from that tone. Great actor, great show, sorely missed.
"Serbian" and "intelligence" are not two words that should be written in one sentence..

This is the only time I can think of in the entire series where John actually fights and defeats a woman in hand to hand combat.  It seems like he never goes up against Shaw or Root in any serious capacity and everyone else he fights is a guy.  If the villain is a woman, they take her down a different way.
Even without Finch, Reese is damn good with the cyber/electronic stuff.
Is there intelligence he didn't beat? Oh, right, the artificial one
description: Fight Scene from S02 X 15: Booked Solid
